name: 3d-print-site
description: Complete file upload platform with client frontend, backend, and admin dashboard

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix admin
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix admin run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm --prefix backend start" "npm --prefix frontend start" "npm --prefix admin start"
